sense.gloss: to poke, to prod, to push, to thrust, to nudge, to hit, to strike
to use (a cane), to prop oneself up with, to press against (the floor, etc.)

sdata.j: テーブルにひじを|↑突↑↓つ↓く|のはやめなさい。
sdata.e: Stop resting your elbows on the table.

sdata.j: ↑羽子板↑↓はごいた↓で|↑突↑↓つ↓く|↑羽↑↓はね↓の↑玉↑↓たま↓は「むくろじ」という↑大木↑↓たいぼく↓の↑種↑↓しゅ↓です。
sdata.e: The feathered balls you hit with a battledore are the seeds of a large tree called 'soapberry'.

sdata.j: もうすぐ、トムの↑貯金↑↓ちょきん↓が↑底↑↓そこ↓を|↑突↑↓つ↓く|。
sdata.e: Tom's savings will soon run out.

sdata.j: テーブルにひじを|↑突↑↓つ↓く|のはやめなさい。
sdata.e: Keep your elbows off the table.
